name: Geeklink
0:
”Alexa,turn on the office light”
”Alexa,turn off the bedroom curtain”
”Alexa,turn on the meeting scene”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Supporting devices :

1.Geeklink feedback switch.
Example Phrases:
Alexa,turn on office light.
Alexa,turn off office light.
Notice:Now support controlling single way of feedback switch if it has name,you can set name of single way in APP.

2.Geeklink curtain motor.
Example Phrases:
Alexa,turn on bedroom curtain.
Alexa,turn off bedroom curtain.

3.Geeklink scene.
Example Phrases:
Alexa,turn on meeting scene.

4.Geeklink TV/Set-Top Box.
Example Phrases:
Alexa,turn on bedroom TV/Set-Top Box.
Alexa,change channel to pbs on TV/Set-Top Box
Alexa, mute TV
Alexa, turn the volume down on TV

5.Geeklink Color-Changing Light Bulb 
Example Phrases:
Alexa,turn on Bedroom Light.
Alexa,Set the Bedroom Light to blue.
Alexa,Set the Bedroom Light to thirty percent.

6.Geeklink AC
Example Phrases:
Alexa,turn on AC.
Alexa,Set the AC to COOL.
Alexa,set AC to 75.

To control light,scene,curtain via Alexa,you should add the supporting devices such as Geeklink feedback switch,Geeklink curtain motor,Geeklink scene in Geeklink APP.After saying 'Alexa,discover my devices' using alexa,you can control all feeback switch extentions,curtain motor and scene easily.For example,say 'Alexa, turn on the office light' if you have a extension device feedback switch and its name is 'office light',then the office light will turn on.Say 'Alexa, turn on the meeting scene' if you have a meeting scene in the Thinker and its name is 'meeting scene',then the scene will be excuted.Besides,now you can control curtain also via saying 'Alexa,turn on bedroom curtain' if its name is 'bedroom curtain'.

To control TV/STB, you can first add the device in your app, name them and then name the channel accordingly, for example, bedroom TV, channel pbs,
and then you can ask Alexa to turn on bedroom TV/Set-Top Box or change channel to pbs on TV/Set-Top Box

To control dimmer, you can add Geeklink dimmer in your app, 
for example name it kitchen light and then ask Alexa to dim the kitchen light

To control AC, you can add Geeklink AC in your app, 
for example name it AC and then ask Alexa to Set the AC to COOL. or set AC to 75

Notice:If you unbind device in Geeklink APP,you must disable this skill and enable skill again.
